High Priest Orven:

Yes... I know you are a brave and strong warrior who has provided their combat skills in many battles. People living in the places where you're farmed for your heroic deeds have spread news about it.

You've achieved many victories but to get stronger you have to defeat more dangerous enemies in more dangerous places. I've in mind one such place.

I'm talking about the Sea of Spores. It's a very good place to improve your skills and grow stronger.

You can get to the Sea of Spores using a teleport, the nearest is in Oren. I suppose a mighty warrior such as yourself can survive in this horrible place.
